attributes.review: opened this app to find the most horrifying despicable person. Will have night terrors for the rest of my life I’m scared to close my eyes. it’s been so difficult to even blink without feeling immense fear and nausea. I do not recommend this app I thought our country was better than this.
attributes.title: disturbing

attributes.review: Immediately after I downloaded this app, Trump flew through my window, kicked my dog and said “wow”. I was so horrified. He went down stairs and made a missile and shot it at me. I am now in the hospital. THEN he flew into space and through Venus at me. And I am now in intensive care. He then said “America is great”. Then passed gas in my face and flew into space.
attributes.title: So sad

attributes.review: This app was absolutely terrible. As soon as I opened it, i saw a picture of a cat attempting to eat corn. Moving on to his home page. I pressed the continue button which then took me to an entire different page that has a tiktok symbol with an X over it... you steal our app, we bring down yours. GEN Z!!!
attributes.title: Gen Z

attributes.review: the content is absolutely inappropriate & absurd, anyone who actually likes this app has to have a mental illness & unable to see properly, also there’s a ton of false advertisement. america was never great, & I keep sending alerts repetitively, very unnecessary &  disturbing content. it supports a rapist & racist. disgusting. must take this down.
attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER!

attributes.review: so when i first opened this app it bombarded me with a whole bunch of inappropriate ads. it kept asking for my phone number to send “push notifications” but in reality that just wasn’t the case if you know what I mean. this app scarred me and I don’t want anyone behind this app to be my president.🤮 JOE BIDEN 2020
attributes.title: this app is horrific🤢

attributes.review: the first thing i saw when i opened the application was a cheeto demanding for my personal information. i don’t know about y’all but i absolutely REFUSE to have MY future run by a cheese puff with dementia. not to mention i’ve been emotionally scarred by his one inch “wonder”. i rate this app and the last four years a ONE star review. 😽
attributes.title: DISGUSTINGG !!!!! 🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.review: This app is just terrible 😢 when I first got in I saw some horrible photos of this orange looking orangutang and it scared me so bad that I had to go to the ER😷 when I got there I showed them the photos and they all passed out 😵 i am horribly traumatized from this app and I hope to never see that orange Cheeto again 🤬
attributes.title: Cheeto 👁👄👁

attributes.review: When i opened the app, i got a text from my cousin saying the air conditioning unit broke! Then my phone started to work very slow. When i closed the app, my phone sped up again! Plus, it has very bad content i do not agree with! This is someone i could not vote for!
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: What happened was I had went into the app right away I don’t know where it said kicked out review wrong I tried going back to anybody kept saying it I wasn’t allowed in the app at all just because I left a two star review I mean one star review because this app is trash
attributes.title: App dosent work

attributes.review: This app is terrible it slowed my phone down so much and made the battery die 3 times faster. I’m guessing it’s because Cheeto man himself is going through my phone in hope of finding some little kid bath tub pictures he can get off to. If I could give it 0 stars, I would. Don’t get it.
attributes.title: No❤️
